headline: Junkiest Junk Is Offering a Warning Sign for Debt
summary: (Bloomberg) -- For much of the year, money managers have embraced optimism and snatched up corporate bonds, sending valuations to ever more expensive levels. Now, Wall Street titans are saying it’s time to focus on how bad things can get. headline: Pfizer Inc. (PFE) Delivers Oncology Milestones with MesoC2 Debut and XTANDI Survival Boost
summary: Pfizer Inc. (NYSE:PFE) has unveiled major advances in cancer research at the 2025 ASCO Annual Meeting, spotlighting robust five-year survival results for XTANDI (enzalutamide) combined with androgen deprivation therapy (ADT) in metastatic hormone-sensitive prostate cancer. Data from the Phase 3 ARCHES trial show XTANDI plus ADT cuts the risk of death by 30%, with a […]

headline: Down 63%, Should You Buy the Dip on Pfizer?
summary: Pfizer has taken its lumps lately. It's time to wonder whether the stock can make a comeback.

headline: Charting the Global Economy: Long-Term Bond Yields Soar Around the World

headline: 1 Ultra-High-Yield Dividend Stock Down 57% to Buy Hand Over Fist
summary: Pfizer's attractive valuation and ultra-high dividend yield make it a great pick right now.  Pfizer (NYSE: PFE) is a great example, with its shares down around 57% below the previous high.  When a stock plunges as much as Pfizer has, there must be a reason behind the decline.
